alert.note: Alert for Coastal Glynn; Inland Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 11:05AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL GLYNN COUNTY THROUGH 1145 AM EDT... At 1104 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout and heavy rainfall near Darien, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, heavy rainfall, and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boys Estate. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
